title: WTB T206 Cobb bat off, Johnson portrait & a question
author: Woundedduck

posts.post_title: WTB T206 Cobb bat off, Johnson portrait & a question
posts.post_content: Have a little extra disposable card cash that I wasn't expecting and have decided to go after 2 cards I didn't think I'd be able to get for a long long time.  Even with the extra cash I know I'm probably still looking at lower conditioned ones.  The question is mostly just wondering if someone can give me a price range for the lowest quality examles up to about a PSA 2 so I can try to figure out what to target for my budget.  Thanks.
